mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.xuesheng_kaoqin_uuid_number as xueshengKaoqinUuidNumber ,a.xuesheng_kaoqin_name as xueshengKaoqinName ,a.xuesheng_kaoqin_types as xueshengKaoqinTypes ,a.xuesheng_kaoqin_content as xueshengKaoqinContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.jiezhi_time as jiezhiTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM xuesheng_kaoqin a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.xuesheng_kaoqin_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengKaoqinUuidNumber},'%')
and a.xuesheng_kaoqin_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengKaoqinName},'%')
and a.xuesheng_kaoqin_types = #{params.xueshengKaoqinTypes}
and a.xuesheng_kaoqin_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengKaoqinContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.jiezhi_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.jiezhiTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.jiezhi_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.jiezhiTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
